abstract: After appearing to shrug off the market gloom for three quarters, private equity fund-raising had a sudden and severe slowdown in the fourth quarter of 2008, according to analysis released Thursday by Dow Jones Private Equity Analyst.
snippet: After appearing to shrug off the market gloom for three quarters, private equity fund-raising had a sudden and severe slowdown in the fourth quarter of 2008, according to analysis released Thursday by Dow Jones Private Equity Analyst.
lead_paragraph: Private equity’s fund-raising machine is finally feeling the cash crunch. After appearing to shrug off the market gloom for three quarters, the industry’s fund-raising had a sudden and severe slowdown in the fourth quarter of 2008, according to analysis released Thursday by Dow Jones Private Equity Analyst.

headline.main: Private Equity Fund-Raising Hits a Wall
